property.name: es_cluster_name
property.description: Elasticsearch Cluster Name identifies your Elasticsearch subsystem

property.name: es_cluster_hosts
property.description: Elasticsearch Cluster hostnames, comma-separated list. Used for unicast discovery (zen_discovery_ping_unicast_hosts).

property.name: index_number_of_shards
property.description: Set the number of shards (splits) of an index. Changes are not effective after index creation.

property.name: index_number_of_replicas
property.description: Set the number of replicas (copies in addition to the first) of an index

property.name: path_data
property.description: Comma-separated list of directories where to store index data allocated for each node. e.g. "/mnt/first","/mnt/second". Number of paths should relate to number of shards, and preferably should be on separate physical volumes.

property.name: http_port
property.description: Set a custom port to listen for HTTP traffic

property.name: transport_tcp_port
property.description: Set a custom port for the node to node communication

property.name: network_bindings
property.description: Network interface(s) ES will bind to within each node. Confirm names via ifconfig. Should have entries for primary external and loopback interfaces, with :ipv4 annotation and quote marks around each entry, eg: "_lo:ipv4_","_eth0:ipv4_"
